def count_promising_substrings(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, s) = case
        f = [0 for i in range(3)]
        cur_bal = n
        cnt_bal = [0 for i in range(2 * n + 1)]
        cnt_bal[cur_bal] -= 1
        f[cur_bal % 3] += 1
        ans = 0
        for i in range(n):
            new_bal = cur_bal
            if s[i] == '-':
                new_bal -= 1
                f[new_bal % 3] += cnt_bal[new_bal]
                ans += f[new_bal % 3]
                cnt_bal[new_bal] += 1
                f[new_bal % 3] += 1
            else:
                f[new_bal % 3] -= cnt_bal[new_bal]
                new_bal += 1
                ans += f[new_bal % 3]
                cnt_bal[new_bal] += 1
                f[new_bal % 3] += 1
            cur_bal = new_bal
        results.append(ans)
    return results
